subject: Re: assertEquals(File source, File target) ?
msgSnippet: Hi all Sorry that was my mistake re: the boolean return code. I meant  assertEquals according to the JUnit assert framework. The junit-addon did the job.
messageBody:
Hi all
Sorry that was my mistake re: the boolean return code.
I meant assertEquals according to the JUnit assert framework.

The junit-addon did the job.

Thanks.


--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Brian Button <bbutton@a...> wrote:
> ianatyahoo@y... wrote:
> >
> >
> > Is there a
> >
> > boolean assertEquals( f1, f2 ) where the contents
> >
> > are compared and evaluated ?
> > It's easy enough to write one but I'd rather reuse than
> > re-invent.
>
> Have a peek at junit-addons.
>
> http://sourceforge.net/projects/junit-addons
>
> bab
>
> --
